keyTakeAways: Kada Scott’s remains were discovered in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school in Philadelphia, identified through DNA testing after an anonymous tip prompted renewed investigation.
Keon King, 21, of Dover, Delaware, was arrested and charged with kidnapping, stalking, arson, causing or risking a catastrophe, conspiracy, and homicide; bail set at $2.5 million.
The black Hyundai Accent was reported stolen the day before Scott went missing and was later seen at a recreation center and found on fire three days later, with its contents compacted at a junkyard.
Cellphone location data and video evidence link King to Scott’s disappearance and movements, suggesting a pattern of contact and possible involvement.
While initial charges in a prior case against King were dropped due to witness non-appearance, he has a history of similar crimes and is now facing multiple new charges.
Authorities indicate that other individuals may have been involved after the fact, and the case remains under active investigation.

Kada Scott, a 23-year-old woman who worked in an assisted living facility, was remembered by her parents as a source of light, kindness, and a beautiful spirit; her family expressed deep grief and requested prayers.

summaryOfNewsArticle: The remains of 23-year-old missing woman Kada Scott were found in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school in Philadelphia after an anonymous tip led investigators to return to the site. Authorities confirmed her identity through DNA testing. Keon King, 21, of Dover, Delaware, was arrested and charged with kidnapping, stalking, arson, conspiracy, and causing a catastrophe, with bail set at $2.5 million. A black Hyundai Accent, reported stolen the day before Scott disappeared, was seen at a recreation center and later found on fire, with evidence linking King to the vehicle and Scott’s disappearance via cellphone location data and video footage. Prosecutors believe King may have been involved in the kidnapping and are investigating the possibility of other individuals being involved after the fact. While previous charges against King were dropped due to witness non-appearance, he is now facing multiple new charges. Scott’s parents described her as a source of light and kindness and expressed deep sorrow over her loss.
title: Remains found behind abandoned school belong to missing Philadelphia woman, Kada Scott, officials say
